debug_text.text: 'MOD: KUDA DAT -- Number of missing variables set: %s.'.[$MissingVarCount]

signal_cue_instantly.param: table[ $col = 7, $colSpan = 2, $text = table[ $text = if global.$DATweaks.$MoveGeneric.$ObjectChangedSector == true then {1001,4825} else {1001,8942}, $color = if global.$DATweaks.$MoveGeneric.$ObjectChangedSector == true then 'Helper.color.green' else 'Helper.color.red', $halign = 'center', ], $onClick = Execute_DynamicEnable, $onRightClick = Execute_DynamicEnable, $echo = ['$MoveGeneric','$ObjectChangedSector',global.$DATweaks.$MoveGeneric.$ObjectChangedSector] ]

debug_text.text: 'MOD: KUDA DAT -- Updated global.$DATweaks.%s.%s from %s to %s'.[event.param.$echo.{1},event.param.$echo.{2},event.param.$echo.{3},global.$DATweaks.{event.param.$echo.{1}}.{event.param.$echo.{2}}]
